data.text: @EnrikaVerbel Hello, Enrika! Thanks for your message. Our apologies for inconveniences caused due to cancelled flight. Please let us know if you have received further information in regards to alternative options. Thank you.

data.text:
Making memories with your loved ones is the greatest treasure in life! 🥰️ This weekend only get a 20 EUR discount for each passenger with a code FLYTOGETHER when booking tickets with loved ones: https://t.co/v1F0muvU7W 💞

❗️ Add baggage during 🎫 booking with a 30% discount! https://t.co/Mh1F2Y0xCO

@DavidBarrett333 @DublinAirport (2/2) We kindly invite you to carefully follow the information on airport monitors to locate our check-in desk or seek for assistance by contacting the ground staff. Thank you.

@DavidBarrett333 @DublinAirport Hello, David! Thanks for your message. Please be informed that we have just contacted our ground staff at Dublin airport and were informed that the check-in desk for mentioned flight is open and most of the passengers have been checked-in. (1/1)

data.text:
We are excited to launch new direct flights between Tampere and Amsterdam 🇳🇱
✈️ Unique museums, bike rides, charming canals and cozy cafes - now both cities are connected with two weekly flights: https://t.co/FdjbAzALQA https://t.co/FbOWiFisAK

@KristineGarina Labdien! Pirmkārt, atvainojamies par reisa kavēšanos un sagādātajām neērtībām. Informējam, ka oriģinālais reģistrēšanās laiks tiek saglabāts, lai gadījumā, ja reiss tomēr var izlidot agrāk, pasažieri laicīgi būtu pageiguši reģistrēšanās procesu. Paldies.

@RolandsDiga Labdien, Roland! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Atvainojamies par šo nepatīkamo situāciju. Vai varam lūgt mums privātā ziņā atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas (aizkavētās bagāžas faila numuru)? Pārbaudīsim tās statusu! Paldies.
@PutnsBezKompasa Labdien! Vēršam uzmanību, ka video redzamā kompānija @BalticTaxi nav saistīta ar lidsabiedrību @airBaltic. Paldies.
@ELEVEN_665 @merelysimple @BalticTaxi @Gaussm Labdien! Vēršam uzmanību, ka video redzamā kompānija @BalticTaxi nav saistīta ar lidsabiedrību @airBaltic. Paldies.
@lauziC Labdien! Vēršam uzmanību, ka video redzamā kompānija @BalticTaxi nav saistīta ar lidsabiedrību @airBaltic. Paldies!
@MyronGainez_ @realNepareizais Labdien! Vēršam uzmanību, ka video redzamā kompānija @BalticTaxi nav saistīta ar lidsabiedrību @airBaltic. Paldies!

urls.title: Visbiežāk uzdotie jautājumi - sazinies ar mums | airBaltic
urls.description: Meklē atbildes uz interesējošiem jautājumiem un atrodi noderīgus kontaktus, lai varētu ar mums sazināties neskaidrību gadījumā. Mēs ar prieku palīdzēsim!

data.text:
@EmilsVeide Labdien, Emīl! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Esam sarūgtināti dzirdēt par šādu pieredzi. Šajā situācijā laipni aicinām sazināties ar mūsu Rezervāciju departamentu zvanot: https://t.co/RhKB58hiYX
Kolēģi pārbaudīs Jūsu konkrēto gadījumu un palīdzēs veikt rezervāciju manuāli. Paldies.

@parslakoo Ja esiet jau iesniegusi mums sūdzību caur tiešsaistes formu, tā tiks izskatīta un izmeklēta, tāpat kā pievienotie dokumenti (ja tādus nosūtījāt jau vēlāk uz šo e-pasta adresi).
Jūsu ekrānšāviņā minētais teksts attiecās tikai uz jauniem iesniegumiem.

urls.title: Aizkavējusies, nozaudēta vai bojāta bagāža | Bagāžas noteikumi | airBaltic
urls.description: Tava bagāža ir aizkavējusies, nozaudēta vai bojāta? Atvainojamies par sagādātajām neērtībām. Lūdzam savlaicīgi ziņot par to airBaltic un aizpildīt iesniegumu!

data.text:
@MartinTheGreat_ Labvakar! Atvainojamies par šo situāciju saistībā ar aizkavēto bagāžu. Lūdzam skatīt šo saiti par tālākajām darbībām un nākamajiem soļiem šajā situācijā: https://t.co/xFcI5d8LaF
Mūsu pārstāvji ar Jums sazināsies tiklīdz bagāža ir atrasta un var tikt Jums nogādāta.
@Bumbuls2 Labvakar, esam sarūgtināti dzirdēt par šādu situāciju. Vai varam lūgt precizēt, kas noticis? Ja vēlaties dalīties ar privātām detaļām, lūdzam sūtīt mums DM ziņu, paldies!

urls.title: Izteikt pretenziju | Sazinies ar mums | airBaltic
urls.description: Gadījās kaut ko aizmirst lidmašīnā? Bagāžas piegāde kavējās? Piesaki pretenziju airBaltic par bagāžas pārvadāšanu, reisa izmaiņām un daudz ko citu internetā!

data.text:
@parslakoo Labdien! Esam sarūgtināti dzirdēt par šādu nepatīkamu situāciju. Aicinām iesniegt oficiālu sūdzību mūsu mājas lapā: https://t.co/KyWmFGU2Mk
Mūsu kolēģi no Klientu apkalpošanas nodaļas rūpīgi izmeklēs konkrēto situāciju un sazināsies ar Jums. Paldies!

Traveling with your four legged friend has never been more pawsome! 😺✈️🐶 Plan ahead and fly to destinations across Europe by adding the pet transportation service to your booking via our Call Center agents. 

🐾 More detailed info can be seen here: https://t.co/umtMXUqOOX https://t.co/ony9XdVjCl
@ArtursKurmis @ArnisRachinskis Paldies par labajiem vārdiem! 💚
@uldis_82 Labdien! Globālo piegāžu ķēžu problēmu dēļ airBaltic ir īslaicīgi izīrējusi papildu lidmašīnas, lai nodrošinātu tās plānoto lidojumu grafiku un to, ka pasažieri sasniedz iecerēto galamērķi.

Happy International Flight Attendants Day 💚
Today we are celebrating people who call the sky their second home - our wonderful cabin crew! ✈️ We're thankful for the dedication, care and joy you bring every day that make you the heart and soul of aviation. https://t.co/TQKSJNFnXK

@raivistrelnieks Paldies par tvītu, zvaigznes nodosim!
🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 ...
@inezwathion Hello, Inez! Please DM us privately more details about the particular claim, we will check!

@DavidBarrett333 @DublinAirport Hello, David! Unfortunately we won't be able to comment on infrastructural situation at the Dublin airport. However, please be informed that our check-in desks usually open two hours before the planned departure time. Thank you.

data.text: @DRCordner Good morning! Please note that our check-in desk at the airport opens approximately 2 hours before flight departure time, however we do understand your disappointment. We do apologize for the long queue and will pass this tweet to responsible teams.

Ja Juris Gaisiņš var kļūt par stjuartu, tad to vari arī tu! ✈️🤩 https://t.co/nyyF1lh7Cg
Viss, kas tev nepieciešams ir vismaz 18 gadi, vidusskolas atestāts kabatā, angļu valodas zināšanas (psst, mēs nodrošinām valodu apmācības, nesatraucies 😉) un peldētprasme! ✈️ Lidojam kopā?

data.text:
@JPn6 Labdien! Globālo piegāžu ķēžu problēmu dēļ airBaltic ir īslaicīgi izīrējusi papildu lidmašīnas, lai nodrošinātu tās plānoto lidojumu grafiku un to, ka pasažieri sasniedz iecerēto galamērķi.
Atvainojamies par lidojuma ekipējuma maiņu un sagādātajām neērtībām šajā situācijā.

@mooneshe Labdien! Vispirms, atvainojamies par lidmašīnas ekipējuma maiņu un sagādātajām neērtībām.
Ja Jūsu rīcībā jau ir iekāpšanas karte ar sēdvietu un tā tiktu mainīta (savādāka lidm. vietu izkārtojuma dēļ), pie iekāpšanas vārtiem Jūs tiksiet informēta par tās izmaiņu un jauno vietu.

🍒 Start your summer right by taking a bite out of our cherry prices! 🍒 Soak up the sun and good vibes in the most gorgeous cities of Europe, go on and join the party: https://t.co/tdTIKmJOyj

🎫 Book 24.05 - 02.06.2022.
✈️ Travel 20.06 - 29.10.2022 https://t.co/rSCNc1q0MI

data.text: @pinciukas1 @Airbus @Schiphol Hello, thanks for your question. Our check-in desks usually open approximately 2 hours before flight departure time. However we will pass your tweet to our team.

@PeterisKloks @normundsbergs Paldies! Pārbaudījām Jūsu gadījumu un redzam, ka ticis iegādāts lidojums, kam tiek piemērota turp-atpakaļ cenas politika. Šādos gadījumos turp-atpakaļ biļete ir lētāka, kā viena virziena biļete. Tas ir arī iemesls, kāpēc konkrētajā situācijā bija iespējama tikai nodokļu atmaksa.

@normundsbergs Labdien! Kā jau Jums atbildējuši mūsu kolēģi, GREEN classic klases pasažieriem ir iespēja bez papildus maksas izvēlēties sev vēlamo vietu, kas Jūsu situācijā tika mainīta. Par sēdvietas izvēli nauda nav tikusi iekasēta, tā bija bezmaksas.
Atvainojamies par tās maiņu un neērtībām.

data.text: Another @Airbus A220-300 jet joins our fleet ✈️ We're excited to welcome our 35th aircraft of this type, registered YL-ABI, which is the third of eight planned Airbus deliveries this year! https://t.co/cCSeagltjG
@UnityQAThomas Thank you! This thread has been passed to our colleagues for further investigation.
@JBAandie Hello! We have received your DM, we will continue our conversation there, thank you!
@Filips_P Labrīt, Filip! Informējam, ka to arī darām - šādi ietekmētiem pasažieriem naudas atmaksu veicam no savas puses automātiski. Vai varam lūgt Jūsu rezervācijas numuru DM ziņā? Pārbaudīsim!

data.text:
@UnityQAThomas Good morning, apologies for such situation.
We would like to note that our Business class check-in desks can be used by passengers with Business, GREEN classic and corporate tickets as well as VIP/Executive status holders. However we will pass your tweet to responsible teams.
@dronico Hello! Please DM us more details privately about your case (case number, booking reference number, baggage irregularity numbers), we will check the status!

Take a look back on the graduation ceremony for 16 of our airBaltic Pilot Academy students 🎓✈️ This graduation marks a significant milestone for the program, which has so far prepared a total of 42 commercial pilots. Smiles, happiness and joy all around! 🎉 https://t.co/xjiIV4LoR7
@Sauljuksss As regulations tend to change, our Cabin Crew will inform if there is such mandate during the flight.
@Sauljuksss Hello! Although still recommended they are not mandatory anymore on our flights (except for some specific routes where country mandates that).

data.text: A new milestone towards our sustainability goals!💚 A total of 24 new electric vehicles will be provided for airBaltic ground handling and other functions. Seven charging stations have been installed on the apron of Riga Airport with more coming this year: https://t.co/jhXAEP5sta https://t.co/qp40GiUGMW

urls.title: airBaltic City Collection - Collection | OpenSea
urls.description: airBaltic – the flag carrier of Latvia, in honour of Latvia’s centenary, in 2018, invited everyone to vote on their favourite towns and cities in Latvia, after which the company’s Airbus A220-300 fleet was named. Starting with Kuldiga, these cities will now one by one be represented on the digital art pieces issued by airBaltic. airBaltic’s jet fleet is the youngest in the Europe, consisting solely of the brand new Airbus A220-300.

data.text:
airBaltic's eleventh #NFT collection is live! 🔔 This edition is showcasing Smiltene city #cryptoart and is available for purchase now: https://t.co/nra0qL6iux
✈️ All owners of the airBaltic City Collection NFTs will be able to receive @PlaniesNFT free of charge in the future! https://t.co/sZebj66coh

@GOJO2711 Hi! We are not observing any major issues with our booking system at the moment so we guess it may be an individual reason. May we kindly ask you to DM us more details about the flights you are booking (with passenger names etc.) as well as error screenshot? We will check.
@MiloOo1982 Points are added to the account within 7 days after the flight has been flown!

data.text: And that's a wrap on the Airbus #A220 Asia-Pacific Demo Tour 👏✈️ Thank you to our friends from @Airbus for inviting us to showcase the state-of-the-art A220-300 through Sydney, Singapore, Hanoi and Tokyo & creating unforgettable memories! #A220Tour https://t.co/tndjHWo9Ik
@MiloOo1982 Hello! No, points can be accrued and collected only for account owner's flights (names and surnames should match of both the passenger in the reservation and airBaltic Club profile).

With the largest graduation ceremony so far, sixteen airBaltic Pilot Academy students became graduates, receiving commercial pilot licenses upon completion of the full-time airline transport pilot program🎓Congratulations on your deserved success and a smooth career take-off!✈️ https://t.co/0X3hUiP6oM

data.text: We're growing! ✈️ In line with the gradual recovery of the aviation market, we have started recruitment of a total of 120 additional pilots - our airBaltic Pilot Academy graduates, former employees and external pilots. Read more: https://t.co/m90gg9dg0A https://t.co/3zxHwHQ39E

Have you met GREEN classic?🎩It's classically good, has everything a passenger could need: free airport check-in, checked baggage, seat reservation, and more!💚Purchase GREEN classic tickets with a discount, save 15€ per one-way flight or 30€ round trip: https://t.co/22zsKZKVZf https://t.co/PdjCbqVOmr

The best news for our passengers and their four-legged friends!😸🐶 Now pets up to 12 kg can travel in the passenger cabin! Make sure to inform the airline, have all the necessary documents, and a travel bag that fits the dimensions. More information here: https://t.co/CBjSkjzn24 https://t.co/wdfMS74SlQ

data.text: Our golden boys or in this case, green boys, @citi_zeni are going to represent 🇱🇻 on the Eurovision stage tonight! 💚 We joined them for an adventure of a lifetime and carried them to 6 different locations in Europe, so tonight we'll be watching with extra love, best of luck! ✨ https://t.co/lVHMpJ6jSo

During April, as the summer season started, we were glad to carry 244 000 happy travelers in around 3150 flights! ☀️ It's almost four times more than during the same period last year: https://t.co/oJZOHUzf4J https://t.co/QggqWJDqyj

data.text: Getting wrapped up in love so tight that the world stands still! 🥰 Sending love and appreciation to all the moms on this special day, happy Mother's day!❤️ https://t.co/lNg3Zw3pQi

data.text: A truly rare sight - airBaltic cabin crew in Hanoi, Vietnam!👋​Grateful to visit this @Airbus #A220Tour stop to showcase our state-of-the-art A220-300 aircraft. https://t.co/0dImp5MqjC

@Jean_Burdisso @Schiphol Hello! Thanks for your question. We usually suggest our passengers to be at the airport at least 2 hours before the departure time. However, if there is currently long waiting time, we suggest you to be at the airport at least 3 hours before the departure. Thank you.

Heart of airBaltic has expanded beyond the Baltics, all the way to Finland! 💚 🇫🇮 Take a closer look into the base opening and feel the warm welcome from Tampere. See the destinations to/from Tampere here: https://t.co/UvA8E6lTPO https://t.co/NqNXJ48zHj
@Kotilainej Hello, thanks for your message! All incoming claims are reviewed in order they are received and usually answered within 10-15 working days during the busy summer season.
@19Cc90 Amazing! Glad you enjoyed the flight! https://t.co/pxhwZsAyhp

data.text: Hello from the Pacific! 👋 We are excited to share that our green tails have reached the Asia-Pacific region to demonstrate our latest A220-300 aircraft on behalf of @Airbus. This aircraft demonstration tour includes four exciting locations: https://t.co/96goQ6dUev https://t.co/Uow0vj3BpG

@digitalreaction This sounds very serious and we would like to investigate it.
If you already have submitted us a claim via the mentioned form, please DM or send us your case number, we will check where the answer might have gone. As for the chats with our team, please DM us more details as well.

urls.title: Submit a claim | Contact us | airBaltic
urls.description: Left your belongings on the plane? Was your baggage delayed? You can submit a claim about baggage, flight irregularities and more to airBaltic online.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @digitalreaction Good morning! We are saddened to read such tweet. In order to better understand all the circumstances as well as improve the service, we kindly ask you to tell us more: https://t.co/N04NoZd2An

Appreciation of freedom has never been more important. May 4th marks a significant turning point in Latvian history - today we celebrate 32 years of restored independence thanks to the courageous Latvian nation 🇱🇻 Daudz laimes, Latvija! https://t.co/gyxDEnCoeB

urls.title: BLACK Friday GREEN SALE
urls.description: During the GREEN SALE flights to all airBaltic destinations are available at their lowest prices.

data.text: Still daydreaming about a sun-sational summer? ☀️ With our GREEN sale deals, the dreams can become reality! 🥰️ Wonderful prices paired with our seasonal destinations, such as Venice, Pisa, Malta have never sounded better: https://t.co/rvPOSRVFgD https://t.co/aEXYRQeI6q

@zanndaT Nemācēsim komentēt par "policijas biroju", taču, varam apstiprināt, ka visas lidmašīnā atrastās mantas pēc lidojuma (to tīrot) pēc procedūras var tikt nogādātas konkrētās lidostas bagāžas Lost & Found birojā, jeb ofisā. Ja manta netiek atrasta - uz ofisu to nogādāt nevar.
@zanndaT Labdien, Zanda! Paldies par Jūsu jautājumu. Šajā situācijā aicinām sazināties ar attiecīgās galamērķa lidostas "Lost and Found" ofisu. Paldies.

@TomUluk Labdien, Tom! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Lūdzam atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas par rezervāciju, kuru vēlējāties veikt (izmantoto e-pasta adresi, kā arī minēto atlaižu kodu), rakstot mums privātu ziņu. Pārbaudīsim ar mūsu kolēģiem no tehniskā departamenta. Paldies!

@BorksPutnins airBaltic has chosen to wet lease additional aircraft short term due to impact caused by the global supply chain issues. Such a decision enables the company to ensure its planned flight schedule.

Today is a very special day - we have opened our Tampere base! 💚✈️ We’re happy to bring our green tails beyond the Baltics to provide connectivity by offering direct flights to 8 amazing destinations: https://t.co/UuzSZHkZZK https://t.co/AuWwV70gU5
@Francois_naude Have a great one!

urls.title: Baltic Outlook magazine | airBaltic
urls.description: Be they adventurous backpackers or sophisticated voyagers, the monthly Baltic Outlook magazine is an excellent resource for any kind of travellers.

data.text: Baltic Outlook May issue is out! ✈️ This month in the spotlight is the city of our new base - Tampere! 🇫🇮 The second biggest city in the happiest country in the world, will charm you with it's people, nature and history. Dive into more stories here 👉 https://t.co/vEqifJkX0s https://t.co/gCtcDhcgnb
